title: Salim Merchant's makes his Tamil debut with Ko2
text:
Salim Merchant, one of the most happening composers in Bollywood, recently made his debut in Tamil with the sequel to Ko. The film's music composer Leon James shared his excitement on roping in the legend Salim Merchant for his album Kannamma Reprise. He said in a statement, "It's his first ever Tamil song and I'm so happy to feature him in this album. While composing this track, I desperately wanted Salim Sir to sing it as he has so much emotion, depth and soul in his voice. I spoke to the producer of the film, Elred Kumar and he was fine with it.
"He said that songs created the urge to watch a film, and if the songs deserved such talents, I shouldn't hesitate. I sent the song to him via email and he immediately responded by saying that the song was beautiful and he would love to record it. Working with him on Kannamma Reprise was such a beautiful and inspiring experience. He is such a humble person and his dedication and love towards good music inspires me to work harder."
